info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 2:56PM MST until January 06 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts up to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph above timberline. * WHERE...Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
